1.name: Madeo
1.description: A mother desperately searches for the killer who framed her son for a girl's horrific murder.

2.name: Inglourious Basterds
2.description: In Nazi-occupied France during World War II, a plan to assassinate Nazi leaders by a group of Jewish U.S. soldiers coincides with a theatre owner's vengeful plans for the same.

3.name: Watchmen
3.description: In 1985 where former superheroes exist, the murder of a colleague sends active vigilante Rorschach into his own sprawling investigation, uncovering something that could completely change the course of history as we know it.

4.name: Avatar
4.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

5.name: Zombieland
5.description: A shy student trying to reach his family in Ohio, a gun-toting tough guy trying to find the last Twinkie, and a pair of sisters trying to get to an amusement park join forces to travel across a zombie-filled America.

6.name: He's Just Not That Into You
6.description: This Baltimore-set movie of interconnecting story arcs deals with the challenges of reading or misreading human behavior.

7.name: X-Men Origins: Wolverine
7.description: The early years of James Logan, featuring his rivalry with his brother Victor Creed, his service in the special forces team Weapon X, and his experimentation into the metal-lined mutant Wolverine.

8.name: Star Trek
8.description: The brash James T. Kirk tries to live up to his father's legacy with Mr. Spock keeping him in check as a vengeful Romulan from the future creates black holes to destroy the Federation one planet at a time.

9.name: The Lovely Bones
9.description: Centers on a young girl who has been murdered and watches over her family - and her killer - from purgatory. She must weigh her desire for vengeance against her desire for her family to heal.

10.name: The Hangover
10.description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They make their way around the city in order to find their friend before his wedding.

11.name: Fantastic Mr. Fox
11.description: An urbane fox cannot resist returning to his farm raiding ways and then must help his community survive the farmers' retaliation.

12.name: Year One
12.description: After being banished from their tribe, two hunter-gatherers encounter Biblical characters and eventually wind up in the city of Sodom.

13.name: Up
13.description: 78-year-old Carl Fredricksen travels to Paradise Falls in his house equipped with balloons, inadvertently taking a young stowaway.

14.name: Up in the Air
14.description: Ryan Bingham enjoys living out of a suitcase for his job, travelling around the country firing people, but finds that lifestyle threatened by the presence of a potential love interest, and a new hire.

15.name: The Proposal
15.description: A pushy boss forces her young assistant to marry her in order to keep her visa status in the U.S. and avoid deportation to Canada.

16.name: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
16.description: As Harry Potter (Daniel Radcliffe) begins his sixth year at Hogwarts, he discovers an old book marked as "the property of the Half-Blood Prince" and begins to learn more about Lord Voldemort's (Ralph Fiennes') dark past.

17.name: Sherlock Holmes
17.description: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

18.name: Terminator Salvation
18.description: In 2018, a mysterious new weapon in the war against the machines, half-human and half-machine, comes to John Connor on the eve of a resistance attack on Skynet. But whose side is he on, and can he be trusted?

19.name: The Invention of Lying
19.description: A comedy set in a world where no one has ever lied, until a writer seizes the opportunity for personal gain.

20.name: Fast & Furious
20.description: Brian O'Conner, back working for the FBI in Los Angeles, teams up with Dominic Toretto to bring down a heroin importer by infiltrating his operation.

21.name: The Princess and the Frog
21.description: A waitress, desperate to fulfill her dreams as a restaurant owner, is set on a journey to turn a frog prince back into a human being, but she has to face the same problem after she kisses him.

22.name: The Road
22.description: In a dangerous post-apocalyptic world, an ailing father defends his son as they slowly travel to the sea.

23.name: The Blind Side
23.description: The story of Michael Oher, a homeless and traumatized boy who became an All-American football player and first-round NFL draft pick with the help of a caring woman and her family.

24.name: 3 Idiots
24.description: Two friends are searching for their long lost companion. They revisit their college days and recall the memories of their friend who inspired them to think differently, even as the rest of the world called them "idiots".

25.name: Friday the 13th
25.description: A group of young adults discover a boarded up Camp Crystal Lake, where they soon encounter Jason Voorhees and his deadly intentions.

26.name: District 9
26.description: Violence ensues after an extraterrestrial race forced to live in slum-like conditions on Earth finds a kindred spirit in a government agent exposed to their biotechnology.

27.name: Moon
27.description: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.

28.description: A frustrated writer struggles to keep his family alive when a series of global catastrophes threatens to annihilate mankind.

29.name: My Bloody Valentine
29.description: Tom returns to his hometown on the tenth anniversary of the Valentine's night massacre that claimed the lives of 22 people. Instead of a homecoming, Tom finds himself suspected of committing the murders, and it seems like his old flame is the only one that believes he's innocent.

30.name: Public Enemies
30.description: The Feds try to take down notorious American gangsters John Dillinger, Baby Face Nelson and Pretty Boy Floyd during a booming crime wave in the 1930s.

31.name: Couples Retreat
31.description: A comedy centered around four couples who settle into a tropical-island resort for a vacation. While one of the couples is there to work on the marriage, the others fail to realize that participation in the resort's therapy sessions is not optional.

32.name: (500) Days of Summer
32.description: An offbeat romantic comedy about a woman who doesn't believe true love exists, and the young man who falls for her.

33.name: The Twilight Saga: New Moon
33.description: Edward leaves Bella after an attack that nearly claimed her life, and, in her depression, she falls into yet another difficult relationship - this time with her close friend, Jacob Black.

34.name: Antichrist
34.description: A grieving couple retreat to their cabin in the woods, hoping to repair their broken hearts and troubled marriage, but nature takes its course and things go from bad to worse.

35.name: Män som hatar kvinnor
35.description: A journalist is aided by a young female hacker in his search for the killer of a woman who has been dead for forty years.

36.name: Bakjwi
36.description: Through a failed medical experiment, a priest is stricken with vampirism and is forced to abandon his ascetic ways.

37.name: Kynodontas
37.description: Three teenagers live isolated, without leaving their house, because their over-protective parents say they can only leave when their dogtooth falls out.

38.name: Chloe
38.description: Suspecting her husband of infidelity, gynecologist Dr. Catherine Stewart hires an escort named Chloe in order to test his faithfulness. Soon, the relationships between all three intensify.

39.name: Jennifer's Body
39.description: A newly possessed high school cheerleader turns into a succubus who specializes in killing her male classmates. Can her best friend put an end to the horror?

40.name: Coraline
40.description: An adventurous 11-year-old girl finds another world that is a strangely idealized version of her frustrating home, but it has sinister secrets.

41.name: The Human Centipede (First Sequence)
41.description: A mad scientist kidnaps and mutilates a trio of tourists in order to reassemble them into a human centipede, created by stitching their mouths to each others' rectums.

42.name: El secreto de sus ojos
42.description: A retired legal counselor writes a novel hoping to find closure for one of his past unresolved homicide cases and for his unreciprocated love with his superior - both of which still haunt him decades later.

43.name: The Ugly Truth
43.description: An uptight television producer takes control of a morning show segment on modern relationships hosted by a misogynistic man.

44.name: Orphan
44.description: A husband and wife who recently lost their baby adopt a 9 year-old girl who is not nearly as innocent as she claims to be.

45.name: Angels & Demons
45.description: Harvard symbologist Robert Langdon works with a nuclear physicist to solve a murder and prevent a terrorist act against the Vatican during one of the significant events within the church.

46.name: Enter the Void
46.description: An American drug dealer living in Tokyo is betrayed by his best friend and killed in a drug deal. His soul, observing the repercussions of his death, seeks resurrection.

47.name: Precious
47.description: In New York City's Harlem circa 1987, an overweight, abused, illiterate teen who is pregnant with her second child is invited to enroll in an alternative school in hopes that her life can head in a new direction.

48.name: G.I. Joe: The Rise of Cobra
48.description: An elite military unit comprised of special operatives known as G.I. Joe, operating out of The Pit, takes on an evil organization led by a notorious arms dealer.

49.name: Love Aaj Kal
49.description: An old-fashioned romantic tells his personal love story to a modern man who has just broken up with his girlfriend. Has love really ever changed?

50.name: Dragonball Evolution
50.description: The young warrior Son Goku sets out on a quest, racing against time and the vengeful King Piccolo, to collect a set of seven magical orbs that will grant their wielder unlimited power.
